main event: An observer reported seeing a light in the sky over Manchester, New Hampshire on 26/09/22.
interesting points: The object appeared to be bright red with whitish highlights and was compared to a star in brightness., The observer noted that the object changed in visibility, 'petering out' slowly and reappearing brighter three times., The object made a faint whisp sound., It was observed for a duration of 2 minutes and 30 seconds., The observer described the edges of the object as blurred, further indicating the unusual nature of the sighting.
sighted object: a bright red light in the sky
witness description: A 39-year-old male real estate salesman from Manchester.
